classData.comment:
/**
 * Query to fetch the viewer's permission level for the repository.
 *
 * This is used to determine the capabilities of the currently authenticated user.
 *
 * Variables required:
 * - $owner: String!
 * - $repo: String!
 */
classData.description:
Query to fetch the viewer's permission level for the repository.

This is used to determine the capabilities of the currently authenticated user.

Variables required:

  • $owner: String!
  • $repo: String!
classData.name: GET_VIEWER_PERMISSION
